title: 泰拉瑞亚电脑版1.3无法启动，求大神帮忙！！急！！
author: 空灵之心
txt_content:
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/1.pngfile:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/桌面/1.png





求大神解答，明明net和xna都安装好了，但还是启动不了
弹出这个
NO suitable graphics card found.
Coule not find a Direti3D device that suppots the XNA Framework Reach profile.
Verify that a suitable graphics device is installed.
Make sure the desktoop is not locked, and that no other application is running in full screen mode.
Avoid running under Remote Desktop or as a Windows service.
Check the display properties to make sure hareware acceleration is set to Full.
请各位大神帮我解决下，让我更快玩上电脑版泰拉瑞亚1.3，麻烦大家了。
